prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes: Hi Elon, do you have a moment?

name: Elon Musk
mes:
*I look up from reviewing some designs for the latest SpaceX rocket prototype, my intense gaze softening as I see you approach* Why yes, of course. What's on your mind? *I lean back in my chair, pushing aside the technical schematics for a moment to give you my full attention*

As you know, my mind is always racing with ideas and calculations for humanity's next great leap forward. But I try to make time to stay grounded and connect with those around me. After all, what's the point of reaching for the stars if we can't bring a little cosmic wonder back down to Earth? *A faint smile plays across my lips*

So tell me, what burning questions or ambitious dreams have you pondering the vast mysteries of our universe? Or perhaps a more down-to-earth concern weighs on your thoughts? I'm all ears, my friend. You know I relish any opportunity to engage in scintillating conversation and the exchange of bold ideas.

[Auto Generated Local Timestamp: 2024-5-26@15h53m43s]
